div.p: You are invited to a friend's birthday. You respond thanking him/her. Suggest some different ways that you can help him/her.
I'am very happy of your invitation.
I would like to prepare a dessert to the party.
How many people will are present ?
Of you prefere that I come to install spotlights to the dancing at the evening.
I want that your birthday's party will be very nice.
I hope that the weather will be nice with a lot of sun.
